question: Which among the following organization is not a part of World Bank Group?
option1: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD)
option3: International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSID)
explanation:
World Bank Group comprises of the following organizations are:
a. International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD).
b. International Development Association (IDA).
c. International Finance Corporation (IFC).
d. Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency (MIGA).
e. International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSID).
